section.name: v_2_11_0
section.item:
The spellbook has been updated to include spells from the following sourcebooks:

• Acquisitions Incorporated
• Explorer\'s Guide to Wildemount
• Lost Laboratory of Kwalish
• Rime of the Frostmaiden

section.name: v_2_12_0
section.item:
The spellbook has been updated to include spells from Fizban\'s Treasury of Dragons.

Typos and minor errors in several spells have been corrected.

section.name: v_2_13_0
section.item: The spellbook has been updated to include spells from Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos.

section.name: v_2_13_1
section.item: The spellbook has been updated to include spells from the Astral Adventurer\'s Guide.
